column4: and here's me extracting the initrd, modifying it and rebuilding
heh
I replaced the gateway machine with a wrt54gs, so we've only got three here (plux xbox)
er.. four
including laptop
i have a wrt54g, and it didnt work very well for me :(
yeah? why not, I run openwrt on it
it wouldnt do dns properly, and i didnt have time to mess around with it
i've been wanting to do that too
ah, I don't know, I never used the standard firmware, I put openwrt straight on
64 bit is nice, esp for a server
yeah, everybody i know with an athlond 64 just runs a 32 bit system on it. that said, performance kicks ass on it anyway
same :)
how are your temperatures on it? my friends are terrible, but i think it's his crappy heatsink and such
ah, i see. i actually have a mobile athlon-xp in my desktop, so i don't run one at all
mine is a athlon-xp mobile 2600+. its more than fast enough for anything i've needed to do, including a handful of games
I play quite a bit of games on mine, ut2k4, world of warcraft, warcraft3, doom3
i did a bit of doom 3, though i'm mostly doing ut2004, and counter-strike source lately
the only issues i've had is with dosbox, just because that thing will eat as much cpu as you can throw at it
well dosbox is a full cpu/system emulator
exactly. but its just so fun to play betrayal at krondor again :D
